reviewText:
Although the DVD I watched was in German without English sub-titles, the narrative was easy to follow. The songs were pleasant, and the comedic skills of the cast[especially Martha Eggerth and Alfred Abel] very entertaining. The visual style of Sirk's direction is enhanced by brilliant camera work. Hopefully ZU NEUEN UFERN will return to DVD distribution, as well others of his early films.

Kingsley Canham, Norwich, United Kingdom
